creator: Allen, Charles William, b.1840. (author)
description: Allen, Charles William: b.1840. Civil servant in Department of the Interior, 1881-1884; journalist with Winnipeg newspapers for a year or two before moving to Halifax ("Civil Service lists" in Canadian sessional papers, 1884; Canadian Press Association, A history of Canadian journalism).
